tasks.task: Prepare for a winter storm on a Georgia homestead
subtasks: Assess animal shelters for water and shelter
Fill water troughs and buckets for animals
Add straw or other bedding to animal shelters for warmth
Check electrical fencing and unplugged grids
Ensure water sources for animals remain ice-free
Secure trees and trim overhanging branches
Check alternative heating sources and firewood availability
Stockpile non-perishable food and water for family use
Clear mud or puddle areas with mulch for safe passage
Reinforce chicken coop and other shelters against wind
Plan for family entertainment and activities during power outage
Check for overhanging branches near houses
Reinforce essentials for animals (shelters, food, water) against storm
Install or ensure weatherstripping on buildings as needed
Ensure emergency supplies (candles, flashlights, batteries) are accessible

tasks.task: **MAINTASK**: Prepare for a winter storm on a homestead in Georgia.
MAINTASK: Prepare for winter storm and ensure animal/homestead safety
